thread.title: Ellen M Pantaleo
thread.title_full: Biblio.com reviewed by Ellen M Pantaleo

author: Ellen M Pantaleo
title: Ellen M Pantaleo
text:
I read and re-read "Boys of 76" many times in elementary school back on Manhattan's West Side. Seeing this gem after six decades was wonderful and nostalgic. The book was in splendid condition, packaged well and arrived speedily. (It was shipped the same day I ordered it!) I am reading it once again happily, and lingering upon the many old great sketches.
A real pleasure and this book seller can be relied upon without hesitation.
